definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.chinese: 他具有强烈的自我意识。

sentences.english: Through self-awareness and self-knowledge only can come tranquillity and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 通过自我意识和自知才能有宁静和智慧。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in self- concept between two sub -groups with different age in left -behind children.
sentences.chinese: 不同年龄组留守儿童的自我意识比较无显著性差异。

sentences.english: It is a restless society and the era of highly self-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个社会躁动不安和自我意识极强的时代。

sentences.english: The results reveal a fascinating correlation between a level of self-awareness and activity in the prefrontal cortex.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示了自我意识程度和前额叶活动的迷人关联。

sentences.english: Procrastination can be beat, it just takes some self-awareness and effort.
sentences.chinese: 拖延能被打败，只是需要一些自我意识和努力。

sentences.english: And as I shifted back and forth, engrossed in thought, I felt a bit self-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 我来回转移，埋首于思考，但还有点自我意识。

sentences.english: The second chapter analyzes the female protagonist Nazneen awakening of female self-consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析女主人公纳兹奈恩女性自我意识的觉醒。

sentences.english: Western Han Dynasty particular period oneself consciousness of Chinese clan.
sentences.chinese: 西汉时期汉民族的自我意识。

sentences.english: i think it made him self-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 我想那支班级环让他有了自我意识。

sentences.english: If you fill it up with your ego, you'll never get more knowledge in.
sentences.chinese: 如果里面充满了自我意识，就很难再装得下新东西。

sentences.english: Self-awareness builds self-esteem through personal appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 自我意识建立自尊通过个人升值。

sentences.english: Also, they are so self-conscious and afraid to speak up.
sentences.chinese: 他们也因自我意识太强而害怕开口说英文。

sentences.english: In order to explain consciousness and self-awareness.
sentences.chinese: 这样才能解释良心和自我意识的存在。

sentences.english: Instead, replace your self-consciousness with other-consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，用他人意识取代自我意识。

sentences.english: You almost never catch a whiff of authorial self-consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 你几乎不能捕捉到一丁点儿作者的自我意识。

definition: to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
